1: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    2: %%% @author cdw
    3: %%% Created 2019/03/21
    4: %%% @doc
    5: %%% @end
    6: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    7: -module(mafiapp_SUITE).
    8: 
    9: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   10: 
   11: %% API
   12: -export([all/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   13:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   14: -export([add_service/1, friend_by_name/1, friend_with_services/1]).
   15: 
   16: all() ->
   17:     [add_service, friend_by_name, friend_with_services].
   18: 
   19: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   20:     Priv = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   21:     application:set_env(mnesia, dir, Priv),
   22:     mafiapp:install([node()]),
   23:     application:start(mnesia),
   24:     application:start(mafiapp),
   25:     Config.
   26: init_per_testcase(add_service, Config) ->
   27:     Config;
   28: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   29:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Don Corleone", [], [boss], boss),
   30:     Config.
   31: 
   32: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   33:     application:stop(mnesia),
   34:     ok.
   35: 
   36: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
   37:     ok.
   38: 
   39: add_service(_Config) ->
   40:     {error, unknown_friend} = mafiapp:add_service("from name", "to name", {1946, 5, 23}, "a fake service"),
   41:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Don Corleone", [], [boss], boss),
   42:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Alan Parsons", [{twitter, "@ArtScienceSound"}], [{born, {1948, 12, 20}}, musician, 'audio engineer', producer, "has projects"], mixing),
   43:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Alan Parsons", "Don Corleone", {1973, 3, 1}, "Helped release a Pink Floyd album").
   44: 
   45: friend_by_name(_Config) ->
   46:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Pete Cityshend",
   47:         [{phone, "418-542-3000"},
   48:             {email, "quadrophonia@example.org"},
   49:             {other, "yell real loud"}],
   50:         [{born, {1945,5,19}},
   51:             musician, popular],
   52:         music),
   53:     {"Pete Cityshend",
   54:         _Contact, _Info, music,
   55:         _Services} = mafiapp:friend_by_name("Pete Cityshend"),
   56:     undefined = mafiapp:friend_by_name(make_ref()).
   57: 
   58: friend_with_services(_Config) ->
   59:     ok = mafiapp:add_friend("Someone", [{other, "at the fruit stand"}],
   60:         [weird, mysterious], shadiness),
   61:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Don Corleone", "Someone",
   62:         {1949,2,14}, "Increased business"),
   63:     ok = mafiapp:add_service("Someone", "Don Corleone",
   64:         {1949,12,25}, "Gave a Christmas gift"),
   65:     {"Someone",
   66:         _Contact, _Info, shadiness,
   67:         [{to, "Don Corleone", {1949,12,25}, "Gave a Christmas gift"},
   68:             {from, "Don Corleone", {1949,2,14}, "Increased business"}]} =
   69:         mafiapp:friend_by_name("Someone").
